A 1991 psychological horror thriller directed by Jonathan Demme, featuring an FBI trainee who seeks the help of a notorious criminal to catch another killer.', '"Jurassic Park" - A 1993 science fiction adventure film directed by Steven Spielberg based on the novel by Michael Crichton, centering around a theme park with genetically recreated dinosaurs.', '"Fight Club" - A 1999 psychological thriller film directed by David Fincher, exploring themes of identity and consumerism through an unreliable narrator\'s experiences.', '"Moonlight" - A 2016 drama film written and directed by Barry Jenkins, which follows the life of a young African-American man growing up in Miami.', '"The Social Network" -
